issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.environment:
windows 2000 
Java Version:    J2ME Foundation Specification v1.1

comments.body:
Attaching a patch to resolve this issue.
Please test this patch before commit.

Thanks
Ramin Moazeni

author.name: myrna
author.emailAddress: m dot v dot lunteren at gmail dot com

comments.body:
Although the published results http://people.apache.org/~fuzzylogic/derby_test_results/main/index.html appear to have some problems, it does show that on Aug 9 - before the patch was checked in - the test still failed, but on August 10, it no longer failed.

So, closing this issue.

updateAuthor.name: myrna
updateAuthor.emailAddress: m dot v dot lunteren at gmail dot com
